mapper.update: UPDATE ticketing SET tIdentitycard=#{tIdentitycard}, tRealname=#{tRealname} WHERE tId=#{tId}
UPDATE ticketing SET tIdentitycard=#{tIdentitycard}, tRealname=#{tRealname},tData=#{datei},tNote=1 WHERE tId=#{tId}
mapper.select: SELECT fImage,fFeature,eId FROM enter as e WHERE fImage is not null and fFeature is not null
SELECT COUNT(tIdentitycard) from ticketing WHERE taId = #{aId}
SELECT tr.UploadQuantity FROM tradeshow AS tr WHERE tr.taid=#{aId}

SELECT e.fImage, t.tSeatingarea, t.tRownumber, t.tSeat, t.tGrandstand, e.eDate, e.aName, e.vName, e.temp, e.tQrcard, e.tIdentitycard FROM enter AS e left join ticketing AS t ON e.tId =t.tId WHERE e.eId = #{eId}
SELECT CONCAT('data:image/jpg;base64,', e.fImage) AS image FROM enter AS e WHERE e.aId=#{aId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ORDER BY e.eDate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT e.tIdentitycard,e.autonym, CONVERT( e.fImage USING utf8 ) AS image
FROM enter AS e WHERE e.aId=#{aId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ORDER BY e.eDate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT e.eId AS ID, CONCAT( e.aId, '01' ) AS performId, e.aId AS projectId, eName AS checkPass, SRAT_ROW AS seatRow, SRAT_COL AS seatCol, CHECK_CERT_TYPE AS checkCertType, BIND_CARD AS checkCertTypeNo, VANAME AS venueName, DATE_FORMAT( ENTRY_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS entryTime, DATE_FORMAT( ENTRY_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS checkTime, tId AS voucherId, BIND_CARD AS bindCard, BIND_NAME AS bindUserName, FLOOR_NAME AS floorName, SRAND_NAME AS standName, DEVICE_NAME AS deviceName, DEVICE_CODE AS deviceCode, DATE_FORMAT( ENTRY_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS insertTime, CONVERT ( BIND_PHOTO USING utf8 ) AS bindPhoto, CONVERT ( BIND_CARD_PHOTO USING utf8 ) AS bindCardPhoto, BIND_CARD AS idcode, BIND_HJDXX AS hjdxx, BIND_MZXX AS mzxx FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT e.*, BIND_PHOTO, BIND_CARD_PHOTO FROM ( SELECT e.eId, e.aId, e.eName, e.tId, e.BIND_NAME, e.BIND_CARD, e.QR_CODE, e.standby, e.ENTRY_TIME, i.CHECK_CERT_TYPE, i.BIND_GENDER, i.BIND_MZXX, i.BIND_HJDXX, i.Device_CODE, i.Device_NAME FROM enter AS e LEFT JOIN enter_info AS i ON e.eId = i.eId WHERE e.aId =#{aid} ) AS e LEFT JOIN enter_fimage AS f ON e.eId = f.eId
) AS e LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tId AS TTID, SRAND_NAME, SRAT_ROW, SRAT_COL, FLOOR_NAME, vName AS VANAME FROM ticketing AS t LEFT JOIN activity AS a ON a.aId = t.aId WHERE t.aId = #{aid} ) AS t ON t.TTID = e.tId ) AS e WHERE e.standby = '0' AND e.BIND_CARD IS NOT NULL AND e.BIND_CARD != '' ORDER BY ENTRY_TIME DESC LIMIT 3000

SELECT a.aId as park_id, a.aName as park, a.vName as venueName, t.QR_CODE as qrCode, t.BIND_NAME as bindUserName, t.BIND_CARD as bindCard, t.BIND_PHONE as bindPhone, t.FLOOR_NAME AS floorName, t.SRAND_NAME AS standName, t.SRAT_ROW AS seatRow, t.SRAT_COL AS seatCol FROM ticketing AS t LEFT JOIN activity AS a ON t.aId = a.aId WHERE t.aId = #{aid}

SELECT eId,aId,aName,vName,eName,tQrcard,tIdentitycard,CONVERT( fImage USING utf8 ) fImage, DATE_FORMAT(eDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eDate,tId ,dWorker,temp,autonym from enter WHERE aId=#{aid} AND dWorker = 0 ORDER BY eDate DESC LIMIT 150

SELECT eId,aId,aName,vName,eName,tQrcard,tIdentitycard, DATE_FORMAT(eDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eDate,tId ,dWorker,temp,autonym from enter WHERE aId=#{aid} AND dWorker ="0" ORDER BY eDate DESC LIMIT 500

SELECT e.tIdentitycard,e.autonym, CONVERT( e.fImage USING utf8 ) AS image
FROM enter AS e WHERE e.aId=#{aId} AND TO_DAYS(e.eDate)=TO_DAYS(NOW()) ORDER BY e.eDate DESC

SELECT t.tId as tid,t.tIdentitycard as tIdentitycard, w.tId as wtid,w.tRealname as wtRealname,w.tIdentitycard as wtIdentitycard ,t.tQrcard FROM ticketing AS t LEFT JOIN ticketing_wechat AS w ON t.tQrcard= w.tQrcard where t.taId=#{aId} AND t.tIdentitycard=''
